languages.text: "Суров ровно настолько, сколько требует долг. Арбитры не имеют права на ошибки и слабости — наше служение слишком важно". {n}Его голос звучит твердо, но отстраненно, точно мысли проктора блуждают где-то далеко.{/n}

"Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Суров ровно настолько, сколько требует долг. Арбитры не имеют права на ошибки и слабости — наше служение слишком важно". {n}Его голос звучит твердо, но отстраненно, точно мысли проктора блуждают где-то далеко.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

"Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

languages.text: "Genauso hart, wie meine Pflicht es verlangt. Ein Arbitrator hat kein Recht auf Fehler oder Schwächen. Unsere Mission ist viel zu wichtig." {n}Die Stimme des Proktors klingt fest, aber teilnahmslos, als wäre er mit seinen Gedanken ganz woanders.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Genauso hart, wie meine Pflicht es verlangt. Ein Arbitrator hat kein Recht auf Fehler oder Schwächen. Unsere Mission ist viel zu wichtig." {n}Die Stimme des Proktors klingt fest, aber teilnahmslos, als wäre er mit seinen Gedanken ganz woanders.{/n}

languages.text: « Aussi dur que mon devoir l'exige, ni plus ni moins. Un arbitrator n'a pas droit à l'erreur, pas plus qu'à la faiblesse. Notre mission est trop importante. » {n}La voix du proctor est ferme, mais détachée, comme si son esprit vaquait au loin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Aussi dur que mon devoir l'exige, ni plus ni moins. Un arbitrator n'a pas droit à l'erreur, pas plus qu'à la faiblesse. Notre mission est trop importante. » {n}La voix du proctor est ferme, mais détachée, comme si son esprit vaquait au loin.{/n}

languages.text: “这是职责所在，我必须以苛刻的态度要求自己。法务官无权犯错，也绝不允许有任何缺陷，因为我们的使命实在是太重要了。”{n}尽管索罗蒙的声音听起来很坚定，但却有些心不在焉，仿佛思绪已经飘向了远方。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是职责所在，我必须以苛刻的态度要求自己。法务官无权犯错，也绝不允许有任何缺陷，因为我们的使命实在是太重要了。”{n}尽管索罗蒙的声音听起来很坚定，但却有些心不在焉，仿佛思绪已经飘向了远方。{/n}

languages.text: «Tanto como me exige mi deber. Un Arbitrator no tiene derecho a cometer errores ni a mostrar debilidades. Nuestra misión es demasiado importante». {n}La voz del Procurador es firme, pero distante, como si su mente estuviera lejos de aquí.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tanto como me exige mi deber. Un Arbitrator no tiene derecho a cometer errores ni a mostrar debilidades. Nuestra misión es demasiado importante». {n}La voz del Procurador es firme, pero distante, como si su mente estuviera lejos de aquí.{/n}

languages.text: 「まさに、私の職務が求める厳しさの通りです。アービトレイターにはミスも弱さも許されません。私たちの使命はあまりにも重要だからです」{n}代理人の声は固くもどこかよそよそしく、まるで意識が遠くへ飛んでいるかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まさに、私の職務が求める厳しさの通りです。アービトレイターにはミスも弱さも許されません。私たちの使命はあまりにも重要だからです」{n}代理人の声は固くもどこかよそよそしく、まるで意識が遠くへ飛んでいるかのようだった。{/n}

languages.text: "Yalnızca vazifemin gerektirdiği kadar sertim. Bir Yargıcı'nın hata yapma veya zayıflık gösterme lüksü yoktur. Bizim vazifemiz, bunlar için fazla değerli bir vazifedir." {n}Üsteğmen'in sesi, sanki başka bir şey düşünüyormuş gibi kararlı ancak bir o kadar da mesafeli çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Exactly as harsh as my duty demands that I be. An Arbitrator has no right to mistakes or weaknesses. Our mission is much too important." {n}The Proctor's voice sounds firm but detached, as if his mind is wandering far away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca vazifemin gerektiği kadar sertim. Bir Yargıcı'nın hata yapma veya zayıflık gösterme lüksü yoktur. Bizim vazifemiz bunlar için fazla değerli bir vazifedir." {n}Üsteğmen'in sesi, sanki başka bir şey düşünüyormuş gibi kararlı ancak bir o kadar da mesafelidir.{/n}
